languages.text: {n}Удушитель огромен и напоминает те, что вы видели ранее — без сомнений, этот конструкт создан, чтобы подавлять проявления варпа. Однако в типично друкарском облике этой машины вы видите странные вкрапления — вплавленные неизвестной силой детали, сотворенные из чуждого Комморре материала.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Удушитель огромен и напоминает те, что вы видели ранее — без сомнений, этот конструкт создан, чтобы подавлять проявления варпа. Однако в типично друкарском облике этой машины вы видите странные вкрапления — вплавленные неизвестной силой детали, сотворенные из чуждого Комморре материала.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Удушитель огромен и напоминает те, что вы видели ранее — без сомнений, этот конструкт создан, чтобы подавлять проявления варпа. Однако в типично друкарском облике этой машины вы видите странные вкрапления — вплавленные неизвестной силой детали, сотворенные из чуждого Комморре материала.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before — there is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few strange details in the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}L'énorme carcan ressemble en tout point aux appareils que vous avez déjà vus. Il ne fait aucun doute que sa fonction est de juguler les manifestations du Warp. Vous remarquez cependant quelques détails qui ne correspondent pas à la conception drukhari typique de ce genre d'appareils : plusieurs pièces ont été façonnées dans un matériau introuvable à Commorragh et fusionnées dans la structure par une force inconnue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'énorme carcan ressemble en tout point aux appareils que vous avez déjà vus. Il ne fait aucun doute que sa fonction est de juguler les manifestations du Warp. Vous remarquez cependant quelques détails qui ne correspondent pas à la conception drukhari typique de ce genre d'appareils : plusieurs pièces ont été façonnées dans un matériau introuvable à Commorragh et fusionnées dans la structure par une force inconnue.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}这台巨大的抑制器和你以前见过的某些机械有相似之处。毫无疑问，它可以抑制亚空间的力量。不过，你注意到一部分细节与典型的黑暗灵族设计并不相同。这台机器某些部分是由来自科摩罗之外的材料制成的，通过某种未知的力量强行融合到了整个框架之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台巨大的抑制器和你以前见过的某些机械有相似之处。毫无疑问，它可以抑制亚空间的力量。不过，你注意到一部分细节与典型的黑暗灵族设计并不相同。这台机器某些部分是由来自科摩罗之外的材料制成的，通过某种未知的力量强行融合到了整个框架之中。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}スティフラーは巨大で、あなたが以前見た装置に似ている。その目的が歪みの発現を抑制することであることは間違いない。しかし細部を見ると、典型的なデュカーリによる設計とは異なる部分があることにあなたは気づいた。いくつかの部品はコモラフにはない材料で作られており、未知の力によって骨組みに取り付けられている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スティフラーは巨大で、あなたが以前見た装置に似ている。その目的が歪みの発現を抑制することであることは間違いない。しかし細部を見ると、典型的なデュカーリによる設計とは異なる部分があることにあなたは気づいた。いくつかの部品はコモラフにはない材料で作られており、未知の力によって骨組みに取り付けられている。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Der Unterdrücker ist riesig und ähnelt den Geräten, die du zuvor gesehen hast. Er hat zweifelsfrei den Zweck, Warp-Manifestationen zu unterbinden. Dir fallen aber ein paar Details auf, die nicht zum Konstrukt passen, obwohl es sonst wie eine typische Schöpfung der Drukhari aussieht – mehrere Teile bestehen aus einem Material, das nicht aus Commorragh stammt und das durch unbekannte Kraft mit dem Rahmen des Konstrukts verschmolzen wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Unterdrücker ist riesig und ähnelt den Geräten, die du zuvor gesehen hast. Er hat zweifelsfrei den Zweck, Warp-Manifestationen zu unterbinden. Dir fallen aber ein paar Details auf, die nicht zum Konstrukt passen, obwohl es sonst wie eine typische Schöpfung der Drukhari aussieht – mehrere Teile bestehen aus einem Material, das nicht aus Commorragh stammt und das durch unbekannte Kraft mit dem Rahmen des Konstrukts verschmolzen wurde.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}El supresor es inmenso y se parece a otros dispositivos que has visto antes. No cabe duda de que su propósito consiste en evitar manifestaciones de la disformidad. Sin embargo, te fijas en algunos detalles que parecen fuera de lugar en lo que, por lo demás, es un diseño típicamente Drukhari: varias de sus piezas se han fabricado con un material ajeno a Commorragh y se han fusionado en la estructura mediante una fuerza desconocida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El supresor es inmenso y se parece a otros dispositivos que has visto antes. No cabe duda de que su propósito consiste en evitar manifestaciones de la disformidad. Sin embargo, te fijas en algunos detalles que parecen fuera de lugar en lo que, por lo demás, es un diseño típicamente Drukhari: varias de sus piezas se han fabricado con un material ajeno a Commorragh y se han fusionado en la estructura mediante una fuerza desconocida.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Devasa baskılar, daha önce gördüğün cihazları andırıyor. Amacının öteboyut tezahürlerini baskılamak olduğuna şüphe olmasa da tipik bir Drukhari tasarımı gibi görünen yapıda olağan dışı bazı detaylar fark ediyorsun: Bazı parçaları, Commorragh'ta bulunmayan yabancı materyallerden yapılmış ve bilinmeyen bir güç tarafından içine entegre edilmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stifler is enormous and resembles the devices you have seen before. There is no doubt that its purpose is to suppress warp manifestations. However, you notice a few details that are out of step with the construct's otherwise typical Drukhari design: several of its parts were made from a material foreign to Commorragh and fused into its frame by an unknown force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Baskılayıcı devasa bir boyutta ve daha önce gördüğün cihazları andırıyor. Amacının öteboyut oluşumlarını baskılamak olduğuna şüphe yok ancak tipik bir Drukhari tasarımı gibi görünen yapıda olağan dışı bazı detaylar fark ediyorsun: Bazı parçaları Commorragh'ta bulunmayan yabancı materyallerden yapılmış ve içine bilinmeyen bir güç tarafından entegre edilmiş.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire
